qas.question: Opera was introduced in what year?
What accounted for 1.1% of browser use in April 2011?
Opera focused on which quickly growing market?
Opera is also available on which video game console?
When was the Nintendo Wii introduced?

plausible_answers.text: the fast-growing mobile phone web browser market

qas.question: What market did Nintendo focus on to expand its use?

plausible_answers.text: it has never achieved widespread use

qas.question: How has usage of the Nintendo Wii been shown over time?
How many game consoles has Nintendo sold?

context: <b4_0>Opera<b4_0/> debuted <b5_0>in <a0_0>1996<b5_0/><a0_0/>; <b7_0>it has never achieved widespread use<b7_0/>, having less than 2% browser usage share as of February 2012 according to Net Applications. Its <a1_0>Opera-mini version<a1_0/> has an additive share, in April 2011 amounting to 1.1% of overall browser use, but focused on <b6_0>the fast-growing <a2_0>mobile phone web browser<a2_0/> market<b6_0/>, being preinstalled on <b8_0>over 40 million<b8_0/> phones. It is also available on several other embedded systems, including <a3_0>Nintendo's Wii<a3_0/> video game console.
